org-tagline: Ho lwela ditokelo, ho aha tsebo, ho etsa diphetoho
hero-title: Ho matlafatsa bophelo, ho sireletsa ditokelo
hero-description: Albinism Foundation Zambia e ikemiselitse ho lwela ditokelo tsa batho ba nang le albinism, ho khothaletsa tsebo, le ho aha sechaba se kenyeletsang seo motho e mong le e mong a ka atlehang ho sona.
mission-statement: Ho lwela ditokelo, seriti, le ho kenyelletsa batho ba nang le albinism Zambia ka matla a kemeletso ya tsebo, ho lwela dipholisi, ditshebeletso tsa tshehetso, le mananeo a ho matlafatsa sechaba.
focus-rights-desc: Ho khothaletsa diphetoho tsa dipholisi le tshireletso ya molao ho netefatsa ditokelo tse lekanang le menyetla ya batho bohle ba nang le albinism.
focus-awareness-desc: Ho ruta dichaba ka albinism ho lwantsha ditoro, maikutlo a fosahetseng, le khethollo ka mananeo a lebisitsweng.
focus-support-desc: Ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa bohlokwa ho kenyelletsa ho aba sunscreen, diaparo tse sireletsang, le ho lokisetsa phihlello ya thokomelo ya bophelo.
focus-education-desc: Ho netefatsa hore bana ba nang le albinism ba fumana thuto ya boleng bo holimo e nang le ditokiso tse loketseng le ditsamaiso tsa tshehetso.
news-1-title: AFZ e qala kemeletso ya naha kaofela
news-1-excerpt: Kemeletso ya rona e felletseng ya tsebo e fihla dichaba tsa mahae ho pholletsa le Zambia ho lwantsha khethollo le ho khothaletsa kutlwisiso.
news-2-title: Katlego ya pholisi: Mehato e mesha ya tshireletso e amohetswe
news-2-excerpt: Mmuso o amohela mehato e mesha ya molao ya ho sireletsa batho ba nang le albinism ho tswa dikgohlong le khethollo.
news-3-title: Katoloso ya lenaneo la tshehetso ya thuto
news-3-excerpt: AFZ e atolosa mananeo a tshehetso ya thuto ho kenyelletsa baithuti ba 200 ba eketsehileng ba nang le albinism diprofenseng tsohle.
cta-description: Mmoho, re ka theha Zambia moo batho ba nang le albinism ba phelang ka seriti, tekatekano, le menyetla.
address: [Aterese ya ofisi ya AFZ - E tlameha ho nkelwa sebaka ka aterese ya nnete]
awareness-description: Mmoho, re thula botsitsitso mme ra senya maikutlo a fosahetseng ka albinism.
awareness-stat-1-desc: Batho lefatsheng ka kakaretso ba tswalwa le albinism
impact-desc-sunscreen: E fana ka sunscreen ho motho ya nang le albinism likhoeli tse 3
donation-type-once: Nehelano ya nako e le nngwe
